reviewText: LOVE PEMA CHODRON. LOVE HER DIRECT, SIMPLE AND INSPIRATIONAL VIEW OF LIFE THAT SHE HAS ACTUALLY LIVED IN  B THE HIGHS AND LOWS , THE BORING, THE DREARY THE JOYOUS, THE FREE..,JUST LIKE ME!LOVE HER VOICE, SENSE OF HUMOUR AND THE " PRESENTATION" -- ALTHOUGH I FELT SHE WAS SORT OF TALKING FREE FORM TO ME. ( THERE WERE OVER 3.000 ON THIS WORKSHOP WEEKEND).I RECOMMEND THESE TAPES 100%--HAVE THEM IN THE CAR TO HELP WASH MY BRAIN OF THE GARBAGE , DAILY.
Title: N/A

reviewText: I was feeling horribly anxious about an upcoming dental procedure and knew I needed more Mindfulness Meditation.I saw this DVD on Amazon as I searched the Pema Chodron section.  The title "Smile at Fear" was just what the doctor ordered. I paid the extra one-day shipping charge on Amazon Prime, got the DVD the next day, and sat calmly, listening to Pema's wisdom. After a good night's sleep, I listened to the rest of the DVD.  While I was not without fear, I learned that "turning into the fear" was much more helpful than running away.I had the dental surgery, going into it with a quiet acceptance, saying to myself "These people are here to help you, not hurt you."  Afterwards, I asked myself, what was the big deal?  I was braver than I thought I could be.Thank you, Pema Chodron.
Title: N/A

reviewText: I have listened to many Pema Chodron books and watched her on video. She has an extraordinary voice and easy to listen to presentation style of complex material making it all very understandable and practiceable.This is a beautiful DVD of a retreat which cost much more than this DVD to attend. You will get to fully experience it as deeply as you want either through repeated watching or doing the exercises along with the DVD which allows time to shut off the DVD to do them. However if you want as I often do to listen to her words and insights, there are several on here including the questions and answers session that are very revealing of the  practice and potential impact on ourselves as well as the world so in need.Highly recommend for individuals as well as group usage for the exercises.
Title: N/A

reviewText: She is the best.  Her teachings are user friendly and very helpful. She is definitely down to earth and you feel she knows what she is talking about because she is living it too and have done the work and is still doing the work.  I have read and heard so much of her work and it always is a treat to learn from her. She is highly recommended by me.P.S. Even though Buddhist teachings, they are helpful to anyone.
summary: You can only win buying Pema Chodron's Books or CDs
Title: N/A

reviewText: I can't say enough about this wonderful, deep, accessible, intellectual, yet practical, CD set.Pema is always right on target.  I find listening to her talks more enjoyable than reading her books, even though they are saturated with excellent teachings, because her humor leavens the lessons.

reviewText: Wonderful to spend time with her since I am in the boonies and this kind of teaching is difficult to come buy.  Great to be able to do it on my own time schedule!  Just wish I had bought the sudio instead of the dvd as it is difficult to get the time to watch and easier to listen.
summary: Any new retreat of Pema Chodron is worth the time
